In the original patch, lava demons are only generated in the [Convict quest](/wiki/Convict_quest "Convict quest"). A lava demon:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a demon.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • resists death magic.
  • cannot be tamed.

A lava demon is a new monster added in the Convict patch, incorporated into UnNetHack, DynaHack, dNetHack, SpliceHack, and SlashTHEM.

In the original patch, lava demons are only generated in the Convict quest. Five lava demons appear on the goal level, at the points of a pentagram formed from lava tiles, with the quest nemesis, Warden Arianna, waiting in the center.

In SpliceHack, lava demons also appear in Mephisto's Lair.

In EvilHack, lava demons are tameable. There is a very small chance that a tame lava demon can be summoned as a side effect of dipping items in forges.

A '''lava demon''' is a new monster added in the [[Convict]] patch, incorporated into [[UnNetHack]], [[DynaHack]], [[dNetHack]], [[SpliceHack]], and [[SlashTHEM]]. 

In the original patch, lava demons are only generated in the [[Convict quest]]. Five lava demons appear on the goal level, at the points of a pentagram formed from [[lava]] tiles, with the [[quest nemesis]], [[Warden Arianna]], waiting in the center.

In SpliceHack, lava demons also appear in [[Mephisto's Lair]].

In EvilHack, lava demons are tameable. There is a very small chance that a tame lava demon can be summoned as a side effect of dipping items in forges.
